channel.title: [647] Alaric [Release]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2u4lzpk.png[/img][/CENTER]
Links: Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?42e4bs41zuobuav Cache: http://www.mediafire.com/?bdatdqc0elowuoe Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?7pinmhtkmi9w5tr
Quote from Perils thread on the basic source: [QUOTE] -Don't forget to put the cache into the cache folder. (rse/data/cache/) -If you dump region data from a region that has not loaded XTEA keys the clipping data will not work!
To dump clipping data use the client from one of the downloads above and use the command while ingame "dumpregion". A dat file will be added to the clipping folder of the client, so take it and put it into rse/data/regions. Also, the client provided above will not crash from the lack of xtea keys.
The Route finder is straight from the client so don't bash on me for it. A side note, some objects such as Bank booths do not clip. Don't ask me why, ask Jagex..[/QUOTE]
There is bugs with route finding, region loading, send items, and multiplayer. Fix those at your own will.
Original Features: [QUOTE] -Packet handling -Walking -Running -Talking -Route finding -Event system -Update server[/QUOTE]
Features:
[ul]Animation & Graphics Mask[/ul]
[ul]Buggy send items packet[/ul]
[ul]Send skills[/ul]
[ul]Pnpc[/ul]
[ul]Appearance Rendering finished[/ul]
[ul]Male & Female appearance[/ul]
[ul]Object Handler, did almost all object examines in Edgeville region[/ul]
[ul]More...[/ul]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/rk0k6c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/sg72fl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2hh1zx4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/16h5hxv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2whovpy.gif[/img]
Credits:
[ul]Emily: Identifying packets, masks, ect, ect[/ul]
[ul]Peril: Original base/source[/ul]
[ul]Dementhium Team: Item definition editor & dump[/ul]
[ul]Lumby: Skillcape handler, emote system is my own[/ul]
[ul]Graham: Cache related files[/ul]
[ul]Flamable: Cache related files[/ul]

farotto:

tbh server would be nice if the banking worked we didnt start game as an admin if noclipping didnt work but it does… what els we also start with glitched super restore potions wielded and in inv you cannot drop or get rid of them. no shops. no commands. its truly just a piece of shit… and its just like a 639…

FYI it’s a base…

item.title: [647] Alaric [Release]
item.dc:creator: @JagexHax JagexHax
item.description:
@JagexHax wrote:

In the Run it says:

@Title RSE 647 @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp

out/production/RSE;lib/netty-3.2.4.jar; org.rse.Server
pause

I just go the lastest x86 jre7 and changed it to… and it still does it.

@Title RSE 647 @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -cp out/production/RSE;lib/netty-3.2.4.jar; org.rse.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: [647] Alaric [Release]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

JagexHax:

[center][size=14pt]I am new to this. I have a few questions. When i push run server it says “System cannont find path specified” Then on the client it gets stuck at 1% Checking for Updates.[/size][/center]

Change the jdk/jre to the version you have and you have to run the server before you run the client because the server has to be online for the client to work.

Read full topic
